text:
The <mt:attach> tag attaches files without specifying any Content-Type
information. This causes pdf files for instance to be sent as
"application/octet-stream" instead of "application/pdf".

It would be wise to ask the servlet container for the content type of the file. 

Further the tag could be refactored to give the possibility to use the "type"
attribute to set explicitely the content type to use. Currently this attribute
is only allowed for content specified in the body of the tag.

Created attachment 10755
Path to set the Content-Type of an attached file
